EmailTemplate.subject: *Thank you for registering*
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for registering to volunteer through indiGO Volunteers, working in partnership with Help Refugees to coordinate and connect projects that need volunteers, with people like you wanting to help.
To complete your registration you simply need to reply to this email, to confirm two things. We can then start to match your skills and availability to independent projects looking for volunteers out here.
1. Confirm Your Dates
Confirm your volunteering start and end dates are correct, so we can match you with the best project and make the most of your time here.
Start date: {!GW_Volunteers__Volunteer_Hours__c.Start_Date_Formula__c}
End date: {!GW_Volunteers__Volunteer_Hours__c.End_Date_Formula__c}
2. Confirm Your Location Flexibility
Please confirm whether you are flexible with your location, and if you are happy to volunteer in Northern Greece, wider Greece, Serbia or Bosnia?
>>>
Prepare to volunteer - please read...
Before you volunteer we suggest you read the following, to get an idea of what happens now and what to expect volunteering through indiGO Volunteers. It coversâ€¦
Who indiGO Volunteers are
What we do in Greece, Serbia & Bosnia
Why are we here?
Things to consider before volunteering
Preparing for your trip
READ NOW >
>>>
We look forward to your confirmation email and can't wait to get you involved!
All the best,
indiGO Volunteers Coordination - Greece
